Articles.Content:
Why stick to just one rover? Just take two!

Stil want to get home afterwards? No problem.

With the Dual Ejection Rover Prototype you can do just this.

The rovers contain fuel that can be used for the landing

> 
> Launch Vehicle
> 
> ![dualejectionroverprotot.png](http://img268.imageshack.us/img268/8762/dualejectionroverprotot.png)
> 
> Landing Module
> 
> ![landingmodule.png](http://img842.imageshack.us/img842/7741/landingmodule.png)
> 
> Approaching Minmus (GO FASTER DAMMIT)
> 
> ![screenshot23l.png](http://img708.imageshack.us/img708/5478/screenshot23l.png)
> 
> Landing, legs deployed
> 
> ![screenshot25.png](http://img201.imageshack.us/img201/9839/screenshot25.png)
> 
> Landed, ready for deployment
> 
> ![screenshot27o.png](http://img819.imageshack.us/img819/4146/screenshot27o.png)
> 
> Deployed first rover, will stay in that position (if you\'re lucky)
> 
> ![screenshot29f.png](http://img829.imageshack.us/img829/6792/screenshot29f.png)
> 
> After using the RCS thrusters to get off the \'pad\', you\'re good to go
> 
> ![screenshot30c.png](http://img51.imageshack.us/img51/5857/screenshot30c.png)
> 
> And in case this happens..
> 
> ![screenshot32z.png](http://img196.imageshack.us/img196/1182/screenshot32z.png)
> 
> Just deploy the other one and continue your exploration
> 
> ![screenshot19h.png](http://img834.imageshack.us/img834/930/screenshot19h.png)
> 
> And after both rovers are crashed completed their mission, switch back to the Lander and get out of there.
> 
> ![screenshot36q.png](http://img822.imageshack.us/img822/6576/screenshot36q.png)
> 
> If you (like me) lost your parachute, there\'s enough fuel and thrust to land without them.
> 
> ![screenshot39v.png](http://img853.imageshack.us/img853/7115/screenshot39v.png)
> 
>
Awesome design! What mods did you use?

> 
> Awesome design! What mods did you use?

That\'s gonna be a tough one. I\'ll try to find and list them all, hang on.

[NovaPunch (I see i have 0.9)](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=4180.0)

[KW Challenger Pack 0.5](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=2680.0)

[Kosmos Space Station Parts Pack V3 (the small strut decouplers to attach the struts over the upper shroud to)](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=7178.0)

[MechJeb of course, it enables switching to the rovers through tracking station](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=8021.0)

[Cart mod (if you drive one, the other one will do the same)](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=8431.0)

[RocktCo Orbital Parts Set](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=3473.0)

.craft included. Do note however that apparently one or more vernier pods can inexplicably fall off at the start off the launch. Also get it off the ground as soon as possible.. or it may fall apart/over ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
